alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Copiah; Hinds; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 2:31AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Warren, Claiborne, Hinds and northwestern Copiah Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 231 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Edwards to near Reganton to near Port Gibson. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Edwards, Reganton and Flowers around 235 AM CDT. Utica around 240 AM CDT. Bolton around 245 AM CDT. Clinton and Dry Grove around 250 AM CDT. Raymond and Carpenter around 255 AM CDT. Jackson and Dentville around 300 AM CDT. Byram around 305 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Learned. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
